Compute Edge-Pseudotime Correlations

Source: R/pseudotime.R
edge_pt_correlation.Rd

Computes correlations between edge weights and pseudotime for a given graph.

Usage

edge_pt_correlation(
  graph,
  seurat_obj,
  pseudotime_col = "pseudotime",
  assay = "RNA",
  layer = "data",
  method = "spearman",
  edge_threshold = 0.95,
  n_cores = 1
)

Arguments

graph

An igraph object.

seurat_obj

A Seurat object.

pseudotime_col

Character, metadata column for pseudotime.

assay

Character, assay to use.

layer

Character, data layer to use.

method

Character, correlation method.

edge_threshold

Numeric, edge weight threshold.

n_cores

Integer, number of cores for parallel computation.

Value

A data frame with edge correlations.
